summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 10.8°C) and outside temperature (down 10.5°C) and more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 10%).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 328 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in the amount of wind (up 21 miles), cloud levels (up 216 m), and outside humidity (down 5%) when compared to today.

Yesterday, cloud levels hit a low of 425m and a high of 1526m, averaging 624.6m; the past week and month reported somewhat higher averages.

summary.summary: Inside; anticipate mild and comfortable temperatures. Outside; chilly temperatures are forecasted. Also, the atmosphere will feel parched and dry and light winds will prevail. Possible light showers, fog or low cloud is expected, and the light is absent. Weather patterns to stay the same.
